isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - DRAIN COCK

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: Drain cocks have a brass body fitted with a tapered brass key. The drain cock is open when the handle is parallel to the drain cock body and closed when the handle is at right angles to the body. Drain cocks are installed in the bottom of each reservoir in the air brake system (Figure 1) to provide a convenient means of draining condensation.

caution.para: Always open a drain cock by hand. Never strike the handle with a hammer or any other instrument, as the cock will be damaged and leakage will develop.
